short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A breathtaking view of a bustling city at night

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perfect for those who love urban aesthetics, this theme brings elegance and energy to your browser's tabs, toolbar, and background. Whether working late or exploring the web, let the city lights inspire your midnight browsing.

Key Features:
- Custom Shortcuts
- Real-Time Clock
- Live Weather Updates
- News
